summary: This file extends the original Order My Items to allow you to order more items.
descriptionHtml:
To alexbull_uk:
If you would like for me to take down this file, message me.
Love,
Wofish

Extends the original Order My Items ( http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51733/? ) to allow you to order more items.

Currently allows you to order everything the original mod did plus :
+ Every other ingredient

Things to come:
+ Add every item
+ The ability to send a Courier to fetch your items
+ A better MCM Menu
- Ability to handpick which items you want to be available

Installation:
1. Just use your preferred mod manager
2. Enable the ESP

Manual Installation:
1. Extract everything to Data folder
2. Enable the ESP
author: alexbull_uk --- Extended by Wofish
